amendment.description: Amendment sought to restore funding for the DOE photovoltaic research program to fiscal year 1996 levels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funds appropriated in the bill for commercialization and marketing programs of the Department of Energy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 90 - 331, 1 Present (Roll no. 356).
